009package Image_Matching;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.pub.matching.DistanceTransform;
017import imagingbook.pub.matching.DistanceTransform.Norm;
018
019/**
020 * Demonstrates the use of the DistanceTransform class.
021 * @author W. Burger
022 * @version 2014-04-20
023 */
024public class Show_Distance_Map implements PlugInFilter {
025        
026        static Norm distanceNorm = Norm.L1;
027        
028        ImagePlus img;
029        
030    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
031        this.img = imp;
032        return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
033    }
034
035    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
036        if (!showDialog())
037                        return;
038        
039        DistanceTransform dt = new DistanceTransform(ip, distanceNorm);
040                FloatProcessor dtIp = new FloatProcessor(dt.getDistanceMap());
041                (new ImagePlus("Distance Transform of " + img.getTitle(), dtIp)).show();
042    }
043    
044        private boolean showDialog() {
045                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
046                gd.addEnumChoice("Distance norm", distanceNorm);
047
048                gd.showDialog();
049                if (gd.wasCanceled())
050                        return false;
051                
052                distanceNorm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(Norm.class);
053                return true;
054        }
055                
056}
